translation.Scopri le ultime novita riguardo parchi: Find out the latest news about parks and marine protected areas
translation.ESPLORA I PARCHI NAZIONALI E LE AREE NAT: EXPLORE NATIONAL PARKS AND PROTECTED NATURAL AREAS
translation.SELEZIONA UNA DELLE 27 AREE MARINE PROTE: SELECT ONE OF THE 27 MARINE PROTECTED AREAS TO FIND OUT MORE

translation.In Italia esistono 871 aree protette, pe: In Italy there are 871 protected areas, for a total of over 3 million protected hectares on land, approximately 2,850 thousand hectares at sea and 658 kilometers of coast.
